REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0280 reute b f BC-PREUSSAG-AG-<PRSG.F> 03-11 0086

TEXT.TITLE: PREUSSAG AG <PRSG.F> YEAR 1986
TEXT.BODY: Domestic group turnover 4.48 billion marks vs 4.29 billion. Turnover comprised - Coal a rounded 1.14 billion vs 1.22 billion Metal 851.0 mln vs 1.14 billion Transport 435.3 mln vs 534.4 mln Oil and chemicals 479.7 mln vs 831.7 mln Plant construction 625.7 mln vs 568.8 mln Miscellaneous 3.3 mln vs 2.2 mln Turnover from majority stake in C. Deilmann AG, consolidated for first time, 951.8 mln marks vs nil Domestic group fixed asset investment 392.6 mln marks vs 291.2 mln. Investment total includes 76.3 mln marks in investment at C. Deilmann AG. REUTER
